definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Set you number of shots, sequence and time.
sentences.chinese: 你還可以設定拍片的張數，順序和時間。

sentences.english: Here is the form for the X-rays. See you later.
sentences.chinese: 這是拍片子的單子，一會兒見。

sentences.english: The past co-productions are mostly Hongkong investment company, issued in the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 過去合拍片大部分都是香港公司投資，在內地發行。

sentences.english: The television company is filming in our town.
sentences.chinese: 電視公司正在我們鎮上拍片子。

sentences.english: The doctor X- rayed my leg last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期醫生用X光給我的腿拍片子。

sentences.english: I always say co-productions can be out living space.
sentences.chinese: 我一直說合拍片可以算是港片生存的空間。

sentences.english: Chan said he feels less encumbered when making films in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 成龍表示，他在香港拍片就不會受到那麼多的限制。

sentences.english: I don't like to do the other film to a long time.
I let the hair, make-up and styling take as long as they need.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果有必要，我會很快的拍片。

sentences.english: The script used in the making of a film is the shooting script.
sentences.chinese: 拍片用的劇本稱爲分鏡頭劇本。

sentences.english: Here's the form for the X-rays. See you later.
sentences.chinese: 這是拍片子的單子，一會兒見。

sentences.english: A few makers use no script AT all but improvise as they go along.
sentences.chinese: 有些拍片人根本不用分鏡頭劇本，邊拍邊即興發揮。

definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
cast and crew/performers and production team
substitute actor (esp. in fights of theatrical stunts)/stuntman
third category movie (containing sexual or violent content)
to document on film the course of events/to follow sb with a camera
